amendment.description: To authorize the conveyance of Land at Louisiana Army Ammunition Plant, Doyline, Louisiana.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3314 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3314 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S6715; text: CR S6715) To authorize the conveyance of Land at Louisiana Army Ammunition Plant, Doyline, Louisiana.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3314 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3314 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Landrieu.
